name: Veil
description:
Part of the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018 - GENRE, but you can’t MECHANIC.

Made by BrainShack / phnomnon

Veil is a 2D Platformer with a twist - Most of the time, you can't see yourself. Avoid lethal Enemies while trying to traverse the levels of this game.

It was Made using Unity3D
